name: setmention
description: REMOVES PREVIOUS CONFIGS. Configure a role to be mentioned when a tracked channel goes live.

options.name: username
options.description: The tracked stream/twitter feed that should send a ping

options.name: role
options.description: The role that should be pinged. If empty, any configured role will no longer be pinged.

options.name: site
options.description: The site name may need to be specified if it can not be inferred.

options.name: text
options.description: Text to be included along with the ping. If empty, any existing text will be removed.

options.name: copyfrom
options.description: A stream tracked in this channel to copy mention settings from. Applied before all other settings.

options.name: membershiprole
options.description: A role to ping for YouTube member-only streams. Can be the same role as regular streams or none.

options.name: membershiptext
options.description: Text to be included for YouTube member-only streams.

options.name: upcomingrole
options.description: A role to ping for 'upcoming' YouTube streams (must be configured to be posted)

options.name: creationrole
options.description: A role to ping when YouTube streams are initially scheduled (must be configured to be posted)

options.name: alternateuploadrole
options.description: An alternate role pinged for YouTube uploads/premieres. Most users should not touch this setting.

options.name: twittercolor
options.description: A custom color to apply to Tweet messages for this feed.
